onset.Description: Time at which the event occurred, in seconds, relative to the beginning of the acquisition.

duration.Description: Duration of the event, in seconds. For events with no duration (e.g., responses), set this to 0.

stim_file.Description: Relative path or identifier for the stimulus file presented.

stimulus.Description: Identifier or name of the stimulus presented.

text_presented.Description: The text displayed to participants during the task.

HED.Description: Hierarchical Event Descriptors (HED) for tagging the event with detailed information.

TaskDescription: A detailed description of the task.
Instructions: Follow the on-screen instructions to complete the task.
